Properties.Description: Azure Database for MySQL allows you to choose the redundancy option for your database server. It can be set to a geo-redundant backup storage in which the data is not only stored within the region in which your server is hosted, but is also replicated to a paired region to provide recovery option in case of a region failure. Configuring geo-redundant storage for backup is only allowed during server create.
Properties.DisplayName: Geo-redundant backup should be enabled for Azure Database for MySQL

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
